mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questionBoard(questionPostnum, userId, subject, content, views, created, boardLike, replyNum, replyLike) VALUES (#{questionPostnum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{views}, #{created}, #{boardLike}, #{replyNum}, #{replyLike})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM questionBoard q JOIN memberInfo q.userId=m.userid

SELECT questionPostnum, q.userId, nickName, subject, views, DATE_FORMAT(q.created, '%Y-%m-%d') created FROM questionBoard q JOIN memberInfo m ON q.userId==m.userId WHERE questionnoticeWhether=1 ORDER BY questionPostnum DESC

SELECT questionPostnum, q.userId, nickName, subject, q.created, views, q.created FROM questionBoard q JOIN memberInfo m ON q.userId=m.userId
ORDER BY questionPostnum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT questionPostnum, q.userId, nickName, subject, content, q.created, views FROM questionBoard q JOIN memberInfo m ON q.userID=m.userId WHERE questionPostnum=#{questionPostnum}

SELECT questionPostnum, subject FROM questionBoard q JOIN memberInfo m ON q.userId=m.userId
AND (questionPostnum > #{questionPostnum})
ORDER BY questionPostnum ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT questionPostnum, subject FROM questionBoard q JOIN memberInfo m ON q.userId=m.userId
AND (questionPostnum < #{questionPostNum})
ORDER BY questionPostnum DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE questionBoard SET views=views+1 WHERE questionPostnum=#{questionPostnum}
UPDATE questionBoard SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE questionPostnum=#{questionPostnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questionFile(questionPostnum, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (#{questionPostnum}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
